text: la ahd 'ashadu zlmana mmn akhtlq ealaa allah taealaa alkdhb, 'aw kdhdhab biayatih almnzlt, 'uwlayik yasil 'iilayhim hzzuhm min aleadhab mimaa kutib lahum fi allwh almhfwz, hataa 'iidha ja'ahum malak almawt waewanh yqbdwn arwahhm qaluu lhm: 'ayn aladhin kuntum tebdwnhm min dun allah min alshuraka' walawlya' walawthan lykhlliswkm mimaa 'antum fyh? qalu: dhahabuu ena, waietarafuu ealaa 'anfusahum hinayidh 'anahum kanuu fi aldunya jahdyn mukadhibin whdanyt allah teala
